title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {BSAIcrabR: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {Tyler Jackson},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1},   url = {https://commfish.github.io/BSAIcrabR/}, }

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
code: devtools::install_github("commfish/BSAIcrabR")

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Data access features construction. Eventually, data access load_* series functions. Use functions download data require connected ADF&G network OceanAK account (fish ticket data).

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: example workflow summarizing fishery data necessary BBRKC stock assessment:
code: # load  library(BSAIcrabR)  # data ## count pot data pot_sum <- load_pot_dump("./bbrkc/data/RKC-1990-2023_potsum.csv", stock = "BBRKC", clean = T)  ## measure pot data obs_meas <- load_crab_dump("./bbrkc/data/RKC-1990-2023_crab_dump.csv", stock = "BBRKC", clean = T)  ## dockside data dock <- load_dockside("./bbrkc/data/RKC-1990-2023_retained_size_freq.csv", stock = "BBRKC", clean = T)  ## timerseries of directed effort dir_effort <- read_csv("./bbrkc/data/directed_effort_timeseries_DP.csv") %>% add_crab_year(., date_correct = F)  ## fish ticket summary by stat area readRDS("./misc/data/fish_ticket_stat_area_summary.RDS") %>%   # combine bbrkc tf and directed fishery   mutate(fishery = gsub("XR|CR", "TR", fishery)) %>%   mutate(fishery = ifelse(fishery == "TR93 (2)", "TR93", fishery)) %>%   filter(substring(fishery, 1, 2) == "TR") %>%   # add crab year   add_crab_year(., date_correct = F) %>%   # rename fields   rename(live_n = live_number,          deadloss_n = deadloss_number,          live_lb = live_lbs,          deadloss_lb = deadloss_lbs) -> ft  # retained catch  get_retained_catch(ft_data = ft) %>%   write_csv("./bbrkc/output/2024/retained_catch.csv")  # total catch  get_total_catch(pot_data = pot_sum, crab_data = obs_meas, ft_data = dir_effort, stock = "BBRKC") %>%   write_csv("./bbrkc/output/2024/total_catch.csv")  # retained size comp  get_dockside_comp(data = dock, by = NULL) %>%   write_csv("./bbrkc/output/2024/retained_catch_composition.csv")  # observer size comp  get_observer_comp(data = obs_meas, by = "sex") -> obs_comp  ## directed fishery obs_comp %>% filter(substring(fishery, 1, 2) == "TR") %>%   write_csv("./bbrkc/output/2024/directed_total_composition.csv")  ## e166 tanner crab obs_comp %>% filter(substring(fishery, 1, 2) == "TT") %>%   write_csv("./bbrkc/output/2024/tanner_bycatch_composition.csv")

title: Add Calculated Weight — add_calc_wt
text: Add calculated weight based weight length parameters.

title: Add Calculated Weight — add_calc_wt
code: add_calc_wt(x, stock, units = "t")

title: Add Calculated Weight — add_calc_wt
text: x crab data includes fields 'size', 'sex', 'clutch' 'maturity' chionoecetes stocks (use_observer = T) 'crab_year' (use_historic = T). stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC. units NULL. Unit measurement, "t" "lb". Default = "t".

title: Add Calculated Weight — add_calc_wt
text: x additional column 'calc_wt'

title: Add Calculated Weight — add_calc_wt
code: add_calc_wt(data, stock = "BBRKC") #> Error in add_calc_wt(data, stock = "BBRKC"): Cannot find sex !!

what: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
title: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
text: Add crab year observer dockside data

title: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
code: add_crab_year(x, date_correct = T, date_format = "mdy")

title: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
text: x Observer dockside data frame "fishery" code column. date_correct crab year correction date different crab year regulatory year time, default = T. date_format Format date field, default = "mdy".

title: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
text: x additional column 'crab_year'

title: Add crab year to data — add_crab_year
code: add_crab_year(dockside) #> Error: object 'dockside' not found

title: Add legal status — add_legal
text: Add legal status crab data

title: Add legal status — add_legal
code: add_legal(x, stock = NULL, use_observer = T, use_current = T)

title: Add legal status — add_legal
text: x crab data includes fields 'size' 'sex', 'legal' (use_observer = T) 'crab_year' (use_historic = T). stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC. use_observer T/F. Default observer record available. x must contain field 'legal'. Default = T. use_current T/F. Use current legal size whole time series, WBT EBT . Default = T.

title: Add legal status — add_legal
text: x additional column 'legal' overwritten legal definition based 1) observer records use_observer = T, 2) size sex observer record missing uncertain. 0 = sublegal, 1 = legal.

title: Add legal status — add_legal
code: add_legal(x = crab_dump, stock = "BBRKC") #> Error: object 'crab_dump' not found

title: Clean Lat and Lon — clean_lat_lon
text: Clean latitude longitude data across dateline

title: Clean Lat and Lon — clean_lat_lon
code: clean_lat_lon(x)

title: Clean Lat and Lon — clean_lat_lon
text: x Pot observer data columns longitude, latitude, eastwest

title: Clean Lat and Lon — clean_lat_lon
text: x location information correctect across date line negative

title: Clean Lat and Lon — clean_lat_lon
code: clean_lat_lon(pots) #> Error: object 'pots' not found

title: Get Average Weight — get_avg_wt
text: Get average weight crab grouping variable using weight length parameters

title: Get Average Weight — get_avg_wt
code: get_avg_wt(data, stock, by, lump = T, units = "t")

title: Get Average Weight — get_avg_wt
text: data NULL. Crab sample data format output load_crab_dump() stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC. NULL. Vector column names crab year, fishery, size use grouping variable. lump T/F Lump shell condition new old (TRUE) (FALSE). Default = TRUE. units NULL. Unit measurement, "t" "lb". Default = "t".

title: Get Average Weight — get_avg_wt
text: Data frame including crab year, fishery, grouping variables, average weight.

title: Get Average Weight — get_avg_wt
code: get_avg_wt(data, by = "group") #> Error in UseMethod("filter"): no applicable method for 'filter' applied to an object of class "function"

title: Get Directed Discards — get_discards
text: Estimate directed fishery discards sex using subtraction method

title: Get Directed Discards — get_discards
code: get_discards(retained_catch, total_catch, stock, handling_mortality = 0.3)

title: Get Directed Discards — get_discards
text: retained_catch NULL. Output get_retaied_catch(). total_catch NULL. Output get_total_catch(). '' argument anything long group sex included. stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC.

title: Get Directed Discards — get_discards
text: Data frame including crab year, fishery, sex, discards, discard mortality.

title: Get Directed Discards — get_discards
code: get_discards(retained_catch, total_catch, stock = "BBRKC", handling_mortality = 0.3) #> Error: object 'total_catch' not found

title: Get retained size composition — get_dockside_comp
text: Compute retained size composition dockside data

title: Get retained size composition — get_dockside_comp
code: get_dockside_comp(data, by = NULL, lump = T)

title: Get retained size composition — get_dockside_comp
text: data NULL. Dockside sample data format output load_dockside() NULL. Vector column names crab year, fishery, size use grouping variable. lump T/F lump shell condition new old (TRUE) (FALSE). Default = TRUE.

title: Get retained size composition — get_dockside_comp
text: Size frequency year, fishery, size

title: Get retained size composition — get_dockside_comp
code: dockside_comp(data, by = "shell", lump = T) #> Error in dockside_comp(data, by = "shell", lump = T): could not find function "dockside_comp"

title: Get observer size composition — get_observer_comp

title: Get observer size composition — get_observer_comp
code: get_observer_comp(data, by, lump = T)

title: Get observer size composition — get_observer_comp
text: data NULL. Dockside sample data format output load_crab_dump() NULL. Vector column names crab year, fishery, size use grouping variable. lump T/F. Lump shell condition new old (TRUE) (FALSE). Default = TRUE.

title: Get observer size composition — get_observer_comp
text: Size frequency year, fishery, size

title: Get observer size composition — get_observer_comp
code: dockside_comp(data, by = "shell", lump = T) #> Error in dockside_comp(data, by = "shell", lump = T): could not find function "dockside_comp"

title: Get Retained Catch — get_retained_catch
text: Get retained catch fish ticket data

title: Get Retained Catch — get_retained_catch
code: get_retained_catch(ft_data, by = NULL, units = "t")

title: Get Retained Catch — get_retained_catch
text: ft_data NULL. Fish ticket data fields 'crab_year', 'fishery', 'effort' whatever variables specified . NULL. Vector column names crab year, fishery use grouping variable. Must present ft_data. units NULL. Unit measurement, "t" "lb". Default = "t".

title: Get Retained Catch — get_retained_catch
text: Data frame including crab year, fishery, grouping variables, average weight.

title: Get Retained Catch — get_retained_catch
code: get_retained_catch(ft_data, by = NULL) #> Error: object 'ft_data' not found

title: Get Total Catch — get_total_catch
text: Estimate total catch observer CPUE data

title: Get Total Catch — get_total_catch
code: get_total_catch(pot_data, crab_data, ft_data, stock, by = NULL, units = "t")

title: Get Total Catch — get_total_catch
text: pot_data NULL. Observer count pot data format output load_pot_dump() crab_data NULL. Observer measure pot data format output load_crab_dump() ft_data NULL. Fish ticket data fields 'crab_year', 'fishery', 'effort' whatever variables specified . stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC. NULL. Vector column names crab year, fishery, group use grouping variable. units NULL. Unit measurement, "t" "lb". Default = "t".

title: Get Total Catch — get_total_catch
text: Data frame including crab year, fishery, grouping variables, average weight. Average weights used expansion weight based crab year, fishery, sex. '' variables included , sum total catch variables (.e., sex shell condition) equal total catch sex.

title: Get Total Catch — get_total_catch
code: get_avg_wt(pot_data, crab_data, ft_data, stock = "BBRKC") #> Error: object 'crab_data' not found

what: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
title: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
text: Load BSAI observer measure pot data data management routine

title: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
code: load_crab_dump(path, stock, database_pull = F, clean = T)

title: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
text: path NULL. Path data file pulling directly database. stock NULL. Character string stock abbreviation: BSSC, WBT, EBT, BBRKC, EAG, WAG, PIGKC, SMBKC, PIBKC, PIRKC, WAIRKC. database_pull Default = FALSE. updated pull database. clean Default = TRUE. stock specific data cleaning.

title: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
text: Measure pot data time series fishery.

title: Load BSAI Observer Measure Pot Data — load_crab_dump
code: load_crab_dump("./data.csv", stock = "BBRKC") #> Error: './data.csv' does not exist in current working directory ('/home/runner/work/BSAIcrabR/BSAIcrabR/docs/reference').
